data.statement: The rate of flow of electric charge through any cross-section of a conductor is known as __________.
Which of the following is non-ohmic resistance?
Combine three resistors 5 Ω, 4.5 Ω, and 3 Ω in such a way that the total resistance of this combination is maximum
In the series combination of two or more than two resistances
options: the current through each resistance is same
the voltage through each resistance is same
neither current nor voltage through each resistance is same
both current and voltage through each resistance are same

data.statement: In parallel combination of n cells, we obtain
A charge is moving across a junction, then
options: at some places momentum will be conserved and at some other places momentum will not be conserved

data.statement: Two resistors of 2 Ω and 4 Ω are connected in parallel. Find the equivalent resistance of the combination.
A circuit has a resistance of 20 Ω and a voltage of 100 V. What is the current flowing through the circuit?
Calculate the power dissipated in a resistor with a resistance of 8 Ω when a current of 4 A flows through it.
